crfModuleGuideline: Pathoanatomic Terms for Definitions of TBI Lesions and Associated Findings (Appendix I)
description: This guideline serves as the foundation to creating common data elements for specific pathoanatomic entities commonly encountered in patients with TBI.

crfModuleGuideline: Pathoanatomic Terms for Definitions of TBI Lesions and Associated Findings (Appendix I)
description: This guideline serves as the foundation to creating common data elements for specific pathoanatomic entities commonly encountered in patients with TBI.

An ordinal clinical rating scale developed to provide a straightforward assessment of functional disability in MS primarily based on ambulation; designed to aid in determining when to implement therapy and as a way to monitor treatment response

PHQ-9 provides a reliable and valid measure of depression severity and also yields a DSM-IV criteria based diagnosis of a depressive disorder. This 9 item measure asks subjects whether and how often they have been bothered by depression related symptoms over the last two weeks, ranging from not at all (0) to nearly every day (3). Based on total score, depression severity ranges from minimal symptoms (5-9) to greater than 20 indicating severe major depression.

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Little interest score
cdes.definitionDescription: Score of how much the subject has been bothered by having little interest or pleasure in doing things in the past two weeks, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: Over the last 2 weeks how often have you been bothered by having little interest or pleasure in doing things?
cdes.permissibleDescription: not at all;Several days;More than half the days;Nearly every day;
cdes.instructions: This question is part of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Depressed score
cdes.definitionDescription: Score of how much the subject has been feeling down and depressed in the past two weeks, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: Over the last 2 weeks how often have you been bothered by feeling down depressed or hopeless?
cdes.permissibleDescription: not at all;Several days;More than half the days;Nearly every day;
cdes.instructions: This question is part of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Sleep impairment score
cdes.definitionDescription: Score of how much the subject has been bothered with troubling falling/staying asleep or sleeping too much in the past two weeks, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: Over the last 2 weeks how often have you been bothered by trouble falling or staying asleep or sleeping too much?
cdes.permissibleDescription: not at all;Several days;More than half the days;Nearly every day;
cdes.instructions: This question is part of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Tired little energy score
cdes.definitionDescription: Score of how much the subject has been feeling tired in the past two weeks, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: Over the last 2 weeks how often have you been bothered by feeling tired or having little energy?
cdes.permissibleDescription: not at all;Several days;More than half the days;Nearly every day;
cdes.instructions: This question is part of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Abnormal diet score
cdes.definitionDescription: Score of how much the subject  has been bothered by abnormal diet/appetite in the past two weeks, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: Over the last 2 weeks how often have you been bothered by poor appetite or overeating?
cdes.permissibleDescription: not at all;Several days;More than half the days;Nearly every day;
cdes.instructions: This question is part of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Feeling failure score
cdes.definitionDescription: Score of how much the subject has been feeling bad for himself/herself in the past two weeks, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: Over the last 2 weeks how often have you been bothered by feeling bad about yourself  or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?
cdes.permissibleDescription: not at all;Several days;More than half the days;Nearly every day;
cdes.instructions: This question is part of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Concentration impairment score
cdes.definitionDescription: Score of how much the subject has been bothered with troubling concentrating in the past two weeks, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: Over the last 2 weeks how often have you been bothered by trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television?
cdes.permissibleDescription: not at all;Several days;More than half the days;Nearly every day;
cdes.instructions: This question is part of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Movement speech impairment score
cdes.definitionDescription: Score of how much the subject has been suffering with moving or speaking too slowly in the past two weeks, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: Over the last 2 weeks how often have you been bothered by moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite  being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual?
cdes.permissibleDescription: not at all;Several days;More than half the days;Nearly every day;
cdes.instructions: This question is part of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Better dead thought score
cdes.definitionDescription: Score of how much the subject has been suffering with the thoughts of that he/she would be better off dead to hurt, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: Over the last 2 weeks how often have you been bothered by thoughts that you would be better off dead or hurting yourself in some way?
cdes.permissibleDescription: not at all;Several days;More than half the days;Nearly every day;
cdes.instructions: This question is part of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire Depression (PHQ-9) - Questionnaire total score
cdes.definitionDescription: Total score of the questionnaire, as the part of Patient Health Questionnaire Depression (PHQ-9).
cdes.questionText: Total Score
cdes.instructions: This question is total score of the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

cdes.cdeName: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ) - Difficulty performing scale
cdes.definitionDescription: The scale related to how difficult it is to do work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people for the subject, as part of the Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ).
cdes.questionText: If you checked off any problems how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work take care of things at home or get along with other people?
cdes.permissibleValue: Not difficult at all;Somewhat difficult;Very difficult;Extremely difficult;
cdes.permissibleDescription: Not difficult at all;Somewhat difficult;Very difficult;Extremely difficult;
cdes.instructions: This question is also use with only the 9-item depression module (PHQ-9).
cdes.referrences: Kroenke K, Spitzer RL, Williams JB. The Patient Health Questionnaire-2: validity of a two-item depression screener. Med Care. 2003; 41(11): 1284-92.
cdes.aliasesForVariableName: Aliases for variable name not defined

description: PHQ-9 provides a reliable and valid measure of depression severity and also yields a DSM-IV criteria based diagnosis of a depressive disorder. This 9 item measure asks subjects whether and how often they have been bothered by depression related symptoms over the last two weeks, ranging from not at all (0) to nearly every day (3). Based on total score, depression severity ranges from minimal symptoms (5-9) to greater than 20 indicating severe major depression.

description: PHQ-9 provides a reliable and valid measure of depression severity and also yields a DSM-IV criteria based diagnosis of a depressive disorder. This 9 item measure asks subjects whether and how often they have been bothered by depression related symptoms over the last two weeks, ranging from not at all (0) to nearly every day (3). Based on total score, depression severity ranges from minimal symptoms (5-9) to greater than 20 indicating severe major depression.

crfModuleGuideline: PD DOC Mini Environmental Risk Questionnaire for Parkinson's Disease Patients Baseline (PD DOC MERQ-PD-B)
description: The mini-environmental risk factor questionnaire (MERQ) is from the Parkinson's Disease Data and Organizing Center (PD-DOC). It contains questions regarding use of medications linked to PD occurrence or progression such as NSAIDs, statins, and hormone replacement therapy.

crfModuleGuideline: PD DOC Mini Environmental Risk Questionnaire for Parkinson's Disease Patients Baseline (PD DOC MERQ-PD-B)
description: The mini-environmental risk factor questionnaire (MERQ) is from the Parkinson's Disease Data and Organizing Center (PD-DOC). It contains questions regarding use of medications linked to PD occurrence or progression such as NSAIDs, statins, and hormone replacement therapy.

description: The Pediatric Migraine Disability Assessment Questionnaire (PedMIDAS) helps assess how much the headaches are affecting day-to-day activity based on the last three months.

cdes.definitionDescription: Count missed full school days in the last 3 months due to headaches, as part of migraine disability assessment (MIDAS) questionnaire-pediatric form.
